005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import java.util.List;
009import java.util.Map;
010
011import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
014
015/**
016 * Represents a container of rules constraining the effective model of a
017 * Metaschema field or flag data instance.
018 */
019public interface IValueConstrained extends IConstrained {
020  /**
021   * Get the collection of let expressions, if any.
022   *
023   * @return the constraints or an empty list
024   */
025  @NonNull
026  Map<QName, ILet> getLetExpressions();
027
028  /**
029   * Get the collection of allowed value constraints, if any.
030   *
031   * @return the constraints or an empty list
032   */
033  @NonNull
034  List<? extends IAllowedValuesConstraint> getAllowedValuesConstraints();
035
036  /**
037   * Get the collection of matches constraints, if any.
038   *
039   * @return the constraints or an empty list
040   */
041  @NonNull
042  List<? extends IMatchesConstraint> getMatchesConstraints();
043
044  /**
045   * Get the collection of index key reference constraints, if any.
046   *
047   * @return the constraints or an empty list
048   */
049  @NonNull
050  List<? extends IIndexHasKeyConstraint> getIndexHasKeyConstraints();
051
052  /**
053   * Get the collection of expect constraints, if any.
054   *
055   * @return the constraints or an empty list
056   */
057  @NonNull
058  List<? extends IExpectConstraint> getExpectConstraints();
059
060  /**
061   * Add a new let expression.
062   *
063   * @param let
064   *          the let statement to add
065   * @return the original let with the same name or {@code null} if no let existed
066   *         with the same name
067   */
068  ILet addLetExpression(@NonNull ILet let);
069
070  /**
071   * Add a new constraint.
072   *
073   * @param constraint
074   *          the constraint to add
075   */
076  void addConstraint(@NonNull IAllowedValuesConstraint constraint);
077
078  /**
079   * Add a new constraint.
080   *
081   * @param constraint
082   *          the constraint to add
083   */
084  void addConstraint(@NonNull IMatchesConstraint constraint);
085
086  /**
087   * Add a new constraint.
088   *
089   * @param constraint
090   *          the constraint to add
091   */
092  void addConstraint(@NonNull IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint);
093
094  /**
095   * Add a new constraint.
096   *
097   * @param constraint
098   *          the constraint to add
099   */
100  void addConstraint(@NonNull IExpectConstraint constraint);
101}
